data.description:
New Low Price: $4.99

Fly on a magic carpet through the mystical land of Bazaar, collecting exotic trinkets for your journey! Beware dart traps, sea cobras, and hungry crocs that lurk around corners. Vandal monkeys have stolen relics from the guardian of the labyrinth - will you recover them in time or be trapped forever?

Steer with your eyes and consult the constellations to navigate this multi-award winning game made by developers that created indie hits Plants vs. Zombies and Cannon Brawl.

Features:
25+ collectible items, with unique abilities
10+ traps and enemies 
Ever-changing labyrinths 
Extensively designed for player comfort

changelog.change_log:
- New feature! A mission box gives you tasks and rewards you with diamonds. 36 new missions to play.
- New diamond store! Use your diamonds to purchases 24 new upgrades.
- New items! 5 new items to find.
- Added optional gamepad support! The shoulder buttons rotate the view, the left button opens the inventory, the top button opens the mission box, and right button opens the map.
- Added 8 new tutorials.
- Improved game balance: The food meter drains faster and some encounters show up sooner.
- Updates from John Carmack's feedback: Alpha-to-coverage and MSAA 4x on S6, fixed some thin UI lines, fixed splash screen gradient, added gamepad support, better raycasting. Thanks John!
- Lots and lots of art and gameplay improvements.

Bazaar v1.2 Patch Notes:
- Lots of polish on the Lamassu battles
- A bunch of art and sound updates
- Added UI for changing volume with the side buttons
- Fixed bug drawing water on Note 4 running Lollipop
- Store now sells arrows and maps
- Fixed the frame rate at night
- Upgraded to Mobile SDK 1.0.0.0

Since the VR jam a lot has changed.  During the jam we crafted a custom 3D engine and created this dreamworld, but now the gameplay is an entirely different beast.

Improvements:
- Roguelike gameplay with permadeath, tons of tuning to crank up starvation and injury threat
- Lots of fun VR moments, including monkeys that jump on your head and block your eyes until you shake them off.
- Higher flight and altitude control with the wing upgrade
- Merchant's shop with rare and valuable upgrades
- Improved inventory management game that pressures players to optimize for a variety of threats
- Over 25 curios to aid your journey
- Genie character with hints and riddles
- Over 10 traps and enemies to keep you on your toes
- Minimap development with new warp mirrors
- Constellations represent and almanac now, not an inventory
- Procedurally generated labyrinth
- Most importantly, we've hammered on perf/heat and other features to maximize player comfort
